, otherwise
throw an error with diagnostics describing the syntax errors.

The absolute position of the starting point of this node. If the first token

The length this node takes up spelled out in the source, excluding its

When isImplicit is true, the syntax node doesn’t include any
underlying tokens, e.g. an empty CodeBlockItemList.

Return an array of enclosing lexical contexts for the purpose of macros,
from the innermost enclosing lexical context (first in the array) to the
outermost. If this syntax node itself is a lexical context, it will be
the innermost lexical context.
